name: Ramadancountdown
0:
”Alexa, open ramadan countdown”
”Alexa, start ramadan countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ramadan countdown
des:
Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until the holy month of Ramadan. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date of Ramadan.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
